name: bestbuyproductdata
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bestbuy_product_data_api.
Tool description: BestBuy Product Data API
Contact me at: vuesdata@gmail.com or visit https://www.vuesdata.com for building custom spiders or custom requests.
API description: It will accept two parameters keyword and page.
For Ex:
keyword: iphone  (it is the search term and it can be anything for example: iphone, ps5, sony tv etc)
page: min 1 (max depends on the number of products available)

page.description: The page number to retrieve, starting from 1.

keyword.description: The search term to look for products, e.g., "iphone", "ps5", "sony tv".
